name: Spark Energy, Inc.
description: Spark Energy, Inc. is a leading independent retail energy services provider based in Houston, Texas. Established in 2014, Spark Energy specializes in offering electricity and natural gas services to residential and commercial customers across the United States. The company operates in deregulated energy markets, allowing customers to choose their energy provider and benefit from competitive pricing and flexible plans. Spark Energy is committed to delivering exceptional customer service and innovative energy solutions, including green energy options that help customers reduce their carbon footprint. Through its subsidiaries, Spark Energy offers a range of services including fixed-rate plans, variable-rate plans, and renewable energy options, enabling customers to select the best solution that meets their needs. With a focus on customer satisfaction and sustainable practices, Spark Energy aims to empower consumers to make informed energy choices that align with their values. The company continues to expand its footprint in the energy market while investing in technology and customer engagement strategies to enhance the overall user experience. Spark Energy is dedicated to fostering a culture of sustainability and social responsibility, contributing positively to the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Spark Energy, Inc. | Independent Retail Energy Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Spark Energy, Inc., a leading retail energy provider offering competitive electricity and natural gas services with a commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Spark Energy offer?
faq.answer: Spark Energy offers electricity and natural gas services, including fixed-rate and renewable energy plans.

faq.question: Where is Spark Energy headquartered?
faq.answer: Spark Energy is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Spark Energy?
faq.answer: Nathan Kropp is the CEO of Spark Energy, Inc.
